There is a new student at Oobu High School. His name is Yakuda Daigo. With his buff body and a tough looking face that can make every one run, soon rumors spread about him. Some says he's a gang leader, others say he is involved with Yakuza business, still more say he rapes, steals and likes beating people.

There are only a handful of people who know who Yakuda really is, including Manami-a. She is a girl Yakuda fell in love with. Yakuda loves to cook and he likes cute things. He also enjoys gardening, crafting and adores pets. He is a very caring person. He always carries around a cute sewing kit and a cute first-aid kit around.

However, with many unfortunate events, he often gets involved with a gang fight or a criminal, along with other coincidental things that happens around him. People always assume the worse for him.

Will everyone find out who he really is?

title: Zoku Attacker You! Kin Medal e no Michi
synopsis: Young and ambitious girls strive to do their very best to become NO.1 team in the sport world of volleyball. Outside the court, they face the problem of termination if they don’t win along with family, love and friendship dilemmas.

title: Otohime Connection
synopsis:
Special based on the manga by Ooya Kazumi, published in Betsukomi Flower Comics.

An all-male pop group doubles as a detective agency. The cute girl member of the agency is kidnapped when one of the men's past returns to trouble them all in the present.

(Source: sandg-anime)

title: Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami: Zutto Kitto Motto
synopsis: A music clip made for the LD Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami Featherstar Box 1. It features an adult Yuu reminiscing about her past.

title: Holiday Love: Fuufukan Renai
synopsis:
Can a relationship survive after an affair? Azu is 30-year-old stay at home mom and she runs a nail salon in her apartment. While carrying the frustration of thinking that her husband Junpei (32) doesn't love her as a woman anymore, she raises the child they were blessed with and continues through the motions of everyday life. One day, while Azu is running her salon, a customer asks to borrow her cellphone, and shows her something dangerously entrancing. A few days afterward, she receives a notification from an unknown man, sending Junpei and Azu's relationship into the deep-end... From Yukari Koyama of the TV drama "Rose-Colored Crusade" comes a challenging original work! You are invited to the story of 4 married people that could take place anywhere, filled with temptation, betrayal, and broken hearts - a true love story!

(Source: Manga Box)

title: Huyao Xiao Hongniang: Yue Hong 2
synopsis:
The story centers on Dongfang Yuechu and Tushan Honghong, recounting their love story from 500 years ago. Young Dongfang Yuechu mistakenly enters Tushan, where he lives as a "lowly servant." Years later, to fulfill Tushan Honghong's wish—peaceful coexistence between humans and demons—Dongfang Yuechu resolutely leaves Tushan to join the Yi Qi Dao Alliance, becoming its leader. However, just when everything seems to be progressing smoothly, danger is slowly approaching…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title: Jing: Shuang Cheng - Feng Qi Pian
synopsis:
In order to avoid troubled times enthusiastic and cheerful Hmong girl Na Sheng travels a long distances to find the dream home-Yunhuang. But is Yunhuang really the legendary Taoyuan Wonderland? With every step she takes deeper into Yunhuang, new scenes of bizarre and horrifying reins of terror is being revealed.

(Source: TMDB)

title: Super Secret
synopsis:
Two neighboring childhood friends. An airheaded girl and the boy who takes care of her like a mother hen. And of course, there is his family background with a tiny, insignificant supernatural secret. Now that her parents have left the girl in their neighbor's care, will she ever discover her friend's secret?

(Source: MU)

title: Boyfriend
synopsis:
Takatou Masaki is the second youngest of four sons, and seemingly a delinquent by nature. His hot temper has put a wedge between himself and his strict father, gotten him kicked out of one school, and tossed him at a school notoriously horrible for the one thing he's truly good at, basketball. A chance encounter with the willful Yuuki Kanako may serve as a catalyst for change, as the indefinable connection she feels with him draws them together... 

(Source: Storm in Heaven)

title: Suki na Ko ga Megane wo Wasureta Short Episode Specials
synopsis: Episodes of Suki na Ko ga Megane wo Wasureta Short Episode exclusive to volumes 1-3 of the Blu-ray.

title: Mu Wang Zhi Wang: Qi Lin Jue
synopsis:
It tells the story of Murong Xian, who murders his father to seize the throne, forming alliances with treacherous officials and internal strife, and engaging in espionage, plunging the Tomb King City into darkness. The mysterious treasure within the Kunlun Mountain tombs attracts various forces, including the Tomb King City, the Imperial Arrest Bureau, and tomb-raiding sects. 

To protect the reputation of the tomb raiding sects and the safety of the treasure, Luo Shiqiu, the young master of the Luo family, and the prodigy Lou Manfeng are tasked with seizing the key to the treasure sealed within the Gu Zi Tomb (the Tomb-Breaking Token). The Tomb King City dispatches its young lord, leading a team of unparalleled experts, to lay numerous traps within the Gu Zi Tomb. Lou Manfeng cleverly used his double agent identity to protect Luo Shiqiu as he trained the Qilin Arm to open the tomb. 

Simultaneously, he exploited internal conflicts within the Tomb King City, persuading the powerful Poison Bone Hand master Han Qianluo, outwitting Lin Shuiyao, the daughter of Mo Gong City's leader, blocking the demon Ling Mo from the Sound Demon Island, and inexplicably defeating the seven supreme tomb guardians during a bloody battle at the Spirit Tower. 

During Luo Shiqiu's battle against the Qilin Young Master, both Luo Shiqiu and Han Qianluo broke their Qilin Arms. In the nick of time, Lou Manfeng, carrying confidential information, suddenly intervened, seizing the treasure key, the Tomb-Breaking Token. Enraged, the tomb guardians launched a counterattack, but Han Qianluo leaped to shield Lou Manfeng from a fatal blow…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title: Yokoo's 3 Animation Films
synopsis: Three short films by the Japanese avant-garde illustrator and animator. Regarded (unfairly) as the Japanese equivalent of Andy Warhol, these films showcase a distinctively commercial illustration look reminiscent of the current pop art movement of that decade (1960s).

title: Oh Yoko!
synopsis:
Backed by an ode John Lennon penned himself, the relationship between him and his wife, Yoko Ono, is beautifully depicted. Alongside their romance, '60s-appropriate psychedelic imagery and various allusions to Lennon's contributions to the Beatles are interlaced within.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Hua Jianghu: Bu Liang Ren II
synopsis:
The Longquan Treasure has reappeared, attracting numerous powerful figures in the martial arts world, including Bu Liang Ren, the Xuanming Sect, the Tongwen Hall, the Huanyin Pavilion, and the Celestial Master's Mansion! Who among the kings can raise their swords and command the world? Li Xingyun, a key figure in the Longquan Treasure and a descendant of the Tang Dynasty, will he rebuild the Tang Dynasty's golden age or retire from the martial arts world? Will Linxuan and Zifan be able to resolve their misunderstandings and rekindle their romance? The secrets of heaven are unpredictable, and the world is but a game of chess.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title: Ousama no Propose
synopsis:
With looks to die for, Saika Kuozaki is the most powerful mage in existence and the only one who can thwart the annihilation factors that attempt to destroy the world once every three hundred hours. When Saika is mortally wounded, however, she bequeaths both her powers and body to the normal high school boy who happens to find her, Mushiki Kuga. Just because Mushiki inherits her abilities, though, doesn't mean he can control them. To stand a chance of saving the world, Mushiki will have to attend an academy for mages as Saika—while trying to keep his true identity under wraps!

(Source: Yen Press)

title: Kurumiwari Ningyou
synopsis:
The young girl Clara visits her Aunt Gerda and Uncle Drosselmeyer. Her aunt tells her scary stories about the Ragman, a creepy and mysterious man who turns children into mice if they don't go to bed on time. The Ragman is always spying on sleeping children searching for more victims.
Just before Clara goes to bed her eccentric uncle gives her a wooden nutcracker doll. He's a bit embarrassed because the only part on the doll that's perfect is the heart, but Clara loves her new doll.
She falls asleep but wakes up hearing mice squeaking...

title: Nine 2: Koibito Sengen
synopsis: Second part of the Nine TV movies.

title: Xingchen Bian 6th Season
synopsis:
The story revolves around Qin Yu and his three brothers after ascending to the God Realm. As Qin Yu gradually learns the rules of the God Realm, he aspires to become the strongest craftsman god in order to marry Jiang Li, a member of one of the eight great families of the God Realm, whose status is vastly different from his own. Starting with eliminating bandits, he rises to become a high-level god, gaining the favor of the Holy Emperor and becoming a rising star… step by step, he finally reaches a position where he can openly propose to Jiang Li. 

However, faced with numerous suitors, the Jiang family, unable to choose, decides to hold a marriage contest for Jiang Li. Whoever can present three gifts that surpass the other competitors will win Jiang Li. Qin Yu endures hardships to forge an unprecedented first-class Primordial Spiritual Treasure as his final betrothal gift. He believes he has everything under control, but at the last moment, the Jiang family disregards fairness and declares Zhou Xian the winner. Qin Yu erupts in anger…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title: Honoo no Alpenrose
synopsis:
Two-part OVA that summarises the entire Honoo no Alpenrose TV series featuring a new dubbing and reworked scenes.

(Source: AniDB)

title: Tuzki: Love Assassin
synopsis:
Tuzki, a bunny, is playing video games with his dismembered heart when he receives a notification on his smartwatch: it looks like an assassination needs to be carried out! Armed with his bazooka, Tuzki is on the job. That is until he meets his target.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Shaonian Jinyiwei
synopsis:
In Ming dynasty, legend goes that there is an ancient deity's book covering a wide range of technical issues, including the unique method of manufacturing the weapons of deity, which has the power to destroy everything. He who gets that book rules the entire nation. Reportedly, in ancient times, deity made the royal family keep the book, as a sign of acknowledging their ruler-ship.

However, in Yuan dynasty, the Mongolians invaded the central plain and ruled the nation. There was chaos everywhere and the book which was supposed to be enshrined in the Imperial Palace was somehow missing and reappeared in the outlaw societies, luring lots of forces to fight for it.

When Han people regained the ruler-ship in Ming dynasty, though the deity's book was found back and enshrined in the Imperial Palace again, those outlaw forces already knew that the book was more than just a legend! It did exist! So they plotted to steal it out. There are there most famous robbers in the outlaw societies: Hell-fire monk, Hua Daochang the thousand-face fox and Duan Yun in white.

One day, on the ghost festival, they sneaked into the Imperial Palace, trying to steal the most precious treasure, competing for the title of "the most famous robber." At last, the hell-fire monk stole the deity's book.

The emperor founded the Imperial Guards to serve as his personal bodyguards and imperial secret polices and spies, among whom, there was a young and inexperienced guard—Yuan Xiaotang，the hero of this animation. The emperor demanded the Imperial Guards catch the three robbers and find back the book. That's how the story begun!

(Source: CA Fansub)

title: Sita Wihayeo
synopsis:
For her sake, he would sacrifice anything...

While volunteering in Nepal, a Korean medical student named Sangmin Han encounters the beautiful yet tragic Sita. Previously, she was a Kumari—a prepubescent girl worshipped as the vessel of a goddess. But she has since been forsaken as a Kumari, and cast out from society. Falling in love, they marry and move to Korea, but their blissful love is short-lived; Sita dies only a year later.

Losing the woman dearest to him, Sangmin desperately begs the gods to bring Sita back. His prayers are answered but in exchange for a sacrifice, and he awakens in the streets of Nepal. However, something is amiss—his body has suddenly aged, and standing in front of him is a young Sita, with no memory of him.

Through two lovers bound together by a destiny running deeper than it first appears, For the Sake of Sita is the story of Sita growing up as a Kumari, and Sangmin's tribulations in trying to avert her terrible fate.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Hua Jianghu: Bei Mo Ting
synopsis: Years ago, Zong Shuai from the Middle State, Wanyan Zang from the Northern Land, and Wen Taiji from the Southern Territory suffered great loss during their fight for the hegemony of the world. As a result, a 20-year truce was established. Now, with the deal coming to an end, conflicts are brewing in the ostensible peace. In hatred and suspicion, the three families set up their respective Blood Orders, listing the names of the most important people of the hostile families and swearing to hunt them down. A breathtaking war is about to commence.

title: Kanojo, Okarishimasu 3rd Season: Kanokari Call
synopsis: A short type of picture dramas released with blu-ray volumes 1-2 of Kanojo, Okarishimasu 3rd Season.

title: Azuki-chan the Movie
synopsis:
It's Valentines' Day, the girls are thinking about the chocolate to give to their love.  Youko is having a party on the Valentines' Day.  The girls refused her invite, but found out that their love are going to her party, even Azuki-chan's brother is going!

Yunosuke-kun gave Azuki-chan a chance to give chocolate to him before Youko's party.  Will she be successful in making a chocolate?  Will Yunosuke-kun receive her love?

title: Tadaima, Ojamasaremasu!
synopsis:
So is this what it means to have roommates now?! Office worker Rinko, 24, lives alone and is secretly an otaku. One day, her apartment gets connected to the two neighboring rooms through a "hole" in the wall.

In the room on the left is a fresh-faced yet mysterious guy who is overly-sweet to Rinko.

The room on the right is occupied by a guy with violent tendencies who is similarly mysterious... But wait! "I... I think I know him!" Rinko's only source of solitude, her apartment, has been turned upside down. Now, every day is full of heart-pounding surprises!

(Source: MangaPlaza)

title: Versailles no Bara: Moetsukita Bara no Shouzou
synopsis: Due to a conflict in scheduling, the broadcast of Versailles no Bara was cancelled in several regions after episode 23. In order to conclude the story, an original episode titled Moetsukita Bara no Shouzou was created. While it features some similar story beats to the actual story, it differs greatly. This episode was never aired again or released on home video.

title: Soul Link Picture Drama
synopsis: Main characters reminiscing about their past.

title: Zukkoke Knight: Don De La Mancha
synopsis: Don Quixote, that infinitely popular character, travels the countryside battling windmills and attempting to win the love of his Dulcinea.

title: Yuuwaku★Office Lover 2
synopsis: Working at an advertising agency, you suddenly become in charge of a new CM project. For an inaugural party, you had help from your friends to turn into a beauty from your normal homely office look. There you met an attractive man who saves you from falling down. But you find out he's the new hateful company president and he's set his eyes on you as prey!

title: Ogami Matsugorou
synopsis:
Schoolboy gang-leader Matsugorou swears revenge when his lieutenant Koume's house is burned down by a land speculator in an insurance scam.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: PES: Peace Eco Smile - Drive your Heart
synopsis: Special spin-off episode that aired between episodes three and four of the original PES series. Is also an ad to Toyota's new Vios vehicle.

title: Tabun
synopsis: Music video animated by Saho Nanjo for the song Tabun by YOASOBI.

title: Akutou Ikka no Manamusume, Tensei-saki mo Otome Game no Gokudou Reijou deshita. Saijoukyuu Rank no Akuyaku-sama, Sono Dekiai wa Fuyou desu!
synopsis:
A girl whose greatest wish was simply to have friends is reincarnated into a game world set in a mafia-controlled early modern era. In her new life, she becomes Francesca, the beloved daughter of one of the Five Great Families that secretly support the monarchy.

Her hopes for a peaceful life are quickly shattered. As soon as the game's main story begins, she is kidnapped by Leonardo, her fiancé—and the story's most dangerous antagonist. However, instead of treating her as an enemy, Leonardo unexpectedly offers to become her "friend." Excited at the chance to gain her first real friend, Francesca throws herself into changing the game's deadly storyline. Drawing on her bold personality and strong sense of loyalty from her previous life, she works to avoid the bad endings awaiting her.

What begins as an attempt to make a friend soon becomes something more complicated, as a former yakuza granddaughter and a ruthless young mafia boss find themselves bound together in a dangerous game where friendship and romance begin to blur.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Matsurika Kanriden
synopsis:
Matsurika, a lady-in-waiting in the imperial palace, has a special talent—an excellent memory. One day, she is asked to act as a practice partner for a nobleman's arranged meeting, only to discover that her partner is none other than Emperor Hakuyou himself, who wished to try a matchmaking meeting. Impressed by her skill, the emperor unexpectedly tells her to "go pass the imperial examination first." Thus begins the tale of a girl singled out by the emperor in this Chinese-style Cinderella story.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Kiss made, Ato 1-byou.
synopsis:
He said he'd stop one second before we kiss... So why are we really kissing right now!? My first kiss is on stage performing a play......! We've been friends since we were kids, and Izuru's always bossing me around. I have to write the script for our school festival play, which is a relief because at least I can steer clear of Izuru, who's playing the leading role of the prince...... But on performance day, the princess gets sick, and I have to take her place! I'm dreading the final kissing scene. We're just supposed to pretend, but now... our lips are... touching...! I know it's Izuru... but he looks like a handsome prince, and... he's actually kinda hot......

(Source: Ebook Renta)

title: Nine: Kanketsu-hen
synopsis: Last part of the Nine TV movies.

title: Chiisana Koi no Monogatari: Chichi to Sally Hatsukoi no Shiki
synopsis:
Tiny schoolgirl Chiiko develops a crush on older boy Sally and believes herself to be his girlfriend, although Sally is already involved in a love triangle with a girl called Tonko.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Huyao Xiao Hongniang 11: Wu Mu Pian
synopsis: Eleventh season of Huyao Xiao Hongniang.

title: Taishou Roman
synopsis: Music video for the song Taishou Roman by YOASOBI.

title: Saijo no Osewa: Takane no Hanadarake na Meimonkou de, Gakuin Ichi no Ojousama (Seikatsu Nouryoku Kaimu) wo Kagenagara Osewa suru Koto ni Narimashita
synopsis:
A high school boy, Itsuki Tomonari, gets involved in a kidnapping and ends up taking care of Hinako Konohana, a young lady from one of Japan's largest conglomerates.

On the surface, Hinako seems to be a brilliant and charming girl, but in reality, she is a lazy girl with no life skills. However, due to family reasons, Hinako has to play the role of the "perfect young lady" at school. Wanting to protect her, Itsuki takes care of her in a very caring manner. Eventually, Hinako begins to fawn on Itsuki with all her might...

"Now... if Itsuki isn't around, I would hate it."

This is a love story that begins with a cute young lady with a gap that transcends the master-servant relationship.

(Source: Hobby Japan, translated)

title: Shiratori Reiko de Gozaimasu!
synopsis:
19-year old Reiko is a rich, arrogant, material girl, who refuses to admit her feelings for classmate Tetsuya Akimoto before it's almost too late. Reiko pursues him to Tokyo and enrolls at his university in an attempt to win him back.

(Source: ANN)

title: Genroku Koi Moyou: Sankichi to Osayo
synopsis:
When a samurai witnesses a dancing maiden being kidnapped by ruffians, he rescues the poor damsel and takes her to the spring flower dance.

(Source: AniDB)

title: Seishun Fuufu Monogatari: Koiko no Mainichi
synopsis:
Based on the romance manga "Koiko no Mainichi " by George Akiyama, serialized in Weekly Manga Goraku.

In a story that flits between serious drama and comedic farce, Shinjuku gangster Sabu and his young wife Koiko try to live a normal life, despite the interferences of gang politics and criminal deals. After she saves his life, Sabu's gang-boss, Tominaga, falls in love with Koiko, and sends Sabu into increasingly more dangerous situations, hoping to cause his arrest, and thus obligate himself to "take care" of Koiko while Sabu is in prison. 

(Source: Anime Mushi)

title: Steady x Study
synopsis:
Nakane Makoto is a freshman in the private school of Kamimori Academy in Harajuku. He enters the drama club because his best friend, Wakabayashi asked him to do so, but it turns out the club is on the verge of dissolution. A girl from Makoto's class, Saitou Koyuki is also a member of the club. In the meanwhile, Makoto's schoolmate since junior high - now a student of the other class - Abegawa Nozomi seeks to launch a so called "study club". Both clubs get into a pinch, as the student council won't finance their activity for this year, and even the day of a performance is approaching... Can the drama club survive this crisis?

(Source: AniDB)

title: Kumo wo Kou
synopsis:
Music video for the song Kumo wo Kou by Keina Suda.

The track featured in this music video was also used as the theme song in the movie Boku ga Aishita Subete no Kimi e.

title: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai PV
synopsis:
A PV for Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai shown at the Comiket 78 and later included on BD/DVD Volume 5. Features original animation not present in the series.

(Source: AniDB, edited)

title: Haru Dorobou
synopsis: Music video directed by Kohta Morie for the song Haru Dorobou by Yorushika.

title: Kobayashi-san no Tsundere Kouza
synopsis: Mini anime for Tsundere Akuyaku Reijou Liselotte to Jikkyou no Endou-kun to Kaisetsu no Kobayashi-san released on Twitter and YouTube.

title: Long Zhong Ren
synopsis:
Fei Xingkong and Sirui suddenly found themselves living in a comic cage, and they wanted to escape back to the real world. However, facing the absolute control of the "author", the two were forced to flee in the unpredictable world of the story... 

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title: Pelican Road Club Caroucha
synopsis: High School boy Kenichi Watanabe is crazy about his MBX50 motorcycle. He and his buddies organize a motorcycle club, which they call Culture.

title: Anata ga Furikaeru Toki
synopsis:
Three shorts based on stories by Hanai Aiko, who also directed this OVA.

(Source: AniDB)

title: Wan Guo Zhi
synopsis:
1663 Common Era, the youngest leader of the Ming dynasty's navy Lu Changfeng is to escort an official to capture criminals but was attacked by a ghost fleet and sea beasts, causing the entire envoy to be sunk. Lu Changfeng was saved by a mysterious girl from the ocean bottom and followed her to the international center of commerce of the Age of Sail: Luzon.

At the time, over 70% of the Ming dynasty's silver was obtained from Luzon, and this tiny island determined the fate of several nations. Spanish settlers cruelly ruled, and people of all walks of life, under the guidance of Song Yingxing, constructed the international finance center: the Kingdom of Wan. Despite disagreements with Song Yingxing, Lu Changfeng still chose to join Song's team: 天工, participating in the struggle against Spanish settlers with others. Both factions used bleeding-edge technological inventions in their battle. To resist the enemy genius Vesalius‘s weapon, Song Yingxing manipulates Lu Changfeng, bringing out his days fighting Vesalius in Korea, etc.

(Source: medium.com)

title: Cheng He Titong 2nd Season
synopsis: Second season of Cheng He Titong.

title: Hua Jianghu: Bu Liang Ren III
synopsis:
With the Qianling Mausoleum destroyed and the Longquan Treasure missing, former prince Li Xingyun seeks to retire to the mountains. Bu Liang Shuai resolves to use the son of heaven to command the nobles, rallying various forces in the martial arts world to restore the Tang Dynasty. The benevolent and the tyrannical will clash in this vortex of power! The tomb of the Imperial Concubine and Chang'an City tell the story of the glorious Tang Dynasty; Miao witchcraft and Xiangxi corpse driving reveal the unknown struggles and conflicts in the martial arts world.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de: Hachiyou Shou Recap
synopsis: A recap of the Harukanaru Toki no Naka de: Hachiyou Shou series included on the special "making-of" DVD release of the Harukanaru Toki no Naka de: Maihitoyo movie.

title: Nippon-ichi no Otoko no Tamashii 2
synopsis: Sequel of Nippon-ichi no Otoko no Tamashii.

title: Mao Yao de Huo Han
synopsis:
A cat demon with a split personality is reincarnated with the memories of her past life. She wishes revenge on her lover from her past life, but upon meeting him finds herself falling all over for him again. What should she do?! A female main character with no sense of moral principles, between an arrogant, abstinent man and the charming, indifferent demon king, who will she choose!

(Source: Anilist)

title: Ogaki Matsuri ni Ikou yo!
synopsis:
A tourism promotion anime for Ogaki City in the Gifu Prefecture. The story's script was written by Kou Nakamura, a famous novelist from Ogaki City.

A love story set during the Ogaki Festival preparations. The festival itself is held in May.

title: Seikai no Senki II Special
synopsis: A recap of Seikai no Senki II included on the "Sekai DVD Box" set.

title: Vivi
synopsis:
A song from a concept album about an imaginary town that is built on top of a catfish. All of the songs are stories that happen in the town. The idea of having a miniature town was one of Yonezu's first when planning the album, and he created characters and stories for the people who lived in the town. Yonezu considers the lyrics of "vivi" to be the closest to his own feelings.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: The Kabocha Wine: Nita no Aijou Monogatari
Kurae! Telepathy
synopsis:
Animated music video for the song Kurae! Telepathy by Maharajan.

The song featured in this music video also used as the opening theme for the anime Tomo-chan wa Onnanoko!

title: Pan to Boku no Momo-chan
synopsis:
The story follows a boy named Shiro and his aunt, Momo, who live together after the death of Shiro's mother, Momo's older sister. Shiro makes bread for Momo in the mornings. 

(Source: ANN)

title: Kaede New Town
synopsis:
Mikio Osawa, an average 5th grade school boy, lives in the suburbs of Osaka. Mikio likes Haruko Tezuka, a cute little girl in his class. However, Mikio is too shy and withdrawn to tell Haruko that he likes her. One day, Mikio's close friend Megane brings news that Haruko is about to move away to another town...

Kaede Newtown is a romantic comedy animation created by Naoto Iwakiri, an Osaka-born illustrator. With cute little characters and music created by Japanese band Aprils and singer-songwriter TOMOVSKY, Kaede Newtown takes you back to the good ol' town you lived in during the good ol' days of your childhood.

(Source: crunchyroll.com)

title: Ruri-iro Princess
synopsis:
High school girl Ruri is dragged into a battle over the fate of the Pulsean Moon when the princess Leila sends assassins to dispense with her. Ruri's lover, Toru, is wounded protecting her, and Ruri must leave the real world behind and journey to the Pulsean Moon to save him. Based on the manga in Omajinai Comic by Mito Orihara, who also wrote the theme song. 

(Source: AnimeVice)

title: Anisava
synopsis:
Welcome to the concrete jungle, where it’s a struggle to survive among the animals of the city. Watch Jake the bear, Jenny the cat and their cast of slightly crazy friends as they live, love and try to stay sane in a wild world.

(Source: Official website)

title: Uchi no Otouto-domo ga Sumimasen
synopsis:
During spring break at the end of her first year of high school, Ito learns she has to move because her mother is getting remarried. What she didn't expect is suddenly gaining four younger stepbrothers under the same roof.

Determined to get along with her new family, Ito does her best to adjust, but the eldest brother, Gen, is distant and hard to read. Yet as they spend more time together, she starts to see glimpses of kindness behind his cool exterior.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Uchi no Otouto-domo ga Sumimasen
synopsis:
During spring break at the end of her first year of high school, Ito learns she has to move because her mother is getting remarried. What she didn't expect is suddenly gaining four younger stepbrothers under the same roof.

Determined to get along with her new family, Ito does her best to adjust, but the eldest brother, Gen, is distant and hard to read. Yet as they spend more time together, she starts to see glimpses of kindness behind his cool exterior.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Re:I Am
synopsis: Music video for the title track RE:I AM by Japanese singer Aimer that was on her 5th single. It was included on DVD with the first limited edition release of the CD. The video was directed by Tsuyoshi Araki.

title: Shanshen Yu Xiaozao
synopsis:
Xiaozao is a girl who always brings misfortune to others. She has to move into a temple named God of Mountains Temple where lives a real god of mountains. Xiaozao met the god when she was a young girl and it seems it’s the god who cursed her. But, later on, they fall in love with each other! And their love story began much earlier than they thought?

(Source: Mangatoon, edited)

title: Yao Shen Ji 9th Season
synopsis: Ninth season of Yao Shen Ji.

title: Choujikuu Seiki Orguss Memorial
synopsis: Summary of The Super Dimension Century Orguss TV series.

title: Twilight Little Star
synopsis: Music video for the song Twilight Little Star by ChouCho. The song was featured as the ending for Masamune-kun no Revenge R.

title: Kizuna (Special)
synopsis: Short animation by Tekken.

title: Nemuranu Machi no Cinderella: Hirose Ryouichi - Memorial Date
synopsis: Short animation created for the most voted character in Voltage's 2012 Character Ranking Commemorative Animation.

title: Renai Saiban
synopsis: Willingness to atone for one's sins by life in prison.

title: Tenshi no Shippo Chu!: Tenshi no Utagoe
synopsis: This special is a compilation video of the whole season in which each girl has a her own individual song sung by her respective voice actress. It highlights her story and there is a karaoke text frame on the bottom for the watcher to sing-a-long.

title: Ohayou! Spank (Movie)
synopsis:
Based on the shoujo manga by Yukimuro Shun'ichi and Takanashi Shizue serialised in Nakayoshi. 

(Source: AniDB)

title: Hua Jianghu: Bu Liang Ren V
synopsis:
Upon Rao Jiang's return, Li Siyuan had already declared himself regent and was using the emperor's name to suppress the unruly elements. Meanwhile, the son of heaven Li Xingyun was about to face a new choice...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title: Musunde Hiraite
synopsis:
A collection of high school love stories, each chapter featuring a different student. For example, Hiro has a crush on a cute upperclassman girl, but she has rejected his advances 15 times! Will Hiro be able to find a way into her heart? His friend Akechi keeps a notebook of information on all the girls at school, but when he goes after the secrets of an incredibly quiet and shy girl, will his interest become more than professional curiosity?

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Kindan Joshi
synopsis:
Hanako, who works for a small publishing company, has a slight communication disorder. Especially forbidden men and women who have never been in love with men. Still, Hanako was having a fulfilling life every day. Because she falls in love in her head! Hanako falls in delusional love with the man she meets somewhere today!

(Source: Official Website)

title: Nan Hong
synopsis:
When Wen Yifan returned to her hometown for work, she unexpectedly ran into the rumored "First-Class Handsome Guy" at a bar. However, she soon discovered that he was Sang Yan, someone she had hurt and rejected in high school. In a twist of fate, these two individuals who could never get along found themselves constantly crossing paths. They even ended up renting the same unit by chance and becoming housemates. With unspoken feelings buried deep within, strong emotions begin to stir...

Let's see how Sang Yan, the "Peak Ideal Boyfriend," interprets and expresses his profound affection and sweet love!

(Source: INKR)

title: Yao Shen Ji 6th Season
synopsis: Sixth season of Yao Shen Ji.

title: Rainbow Finder: Tokimeki wa, Sugu Soba ni.
synopsis: Advertisements for 7-Eleven, highlighting the small encounters of some students that lighten up the day.

title: Yokohama Bakkure-tai
synopsis:
It's all gags and fighting as gangster Tsunematsu Narita (the "biggest idiot in Yokohama") causes havoc in the neighborhood with his two henchmen. 

Based on the Shonen Champion manga by Tetsu Kusumoto.

 (Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Moon Effect
synopsis: Music video that was available for a limited time on YouTube and then included in the limited Blu-ray/DVD edition.

title: Michitekuru Toki no Mukou ni
synopsis:
Based on Suzuki Kouji's novel Paradise, which won the Japan Fantasy Novel Award in 1991.

(Source: AniDB)

title: Mu Wang Zhi Wang: Han Tie Dou
synopsis:
Following the discovery of Gu Zi's Tomb by Lou Manfeng, Han Qianluo, Lin Shuiyao, Luo Shiqiu, and others in the first season, which resulted in the Tomb Breaking Token being released, the event caused a great uproar in the Tomb Sect's martial arts world. The imperial court also began to stir, and a mysterious rival faction made its appearance, further turbulent and unsettling the entire Tomb Sect's martial arts world.

(Source: Bangumi, translated)

title: Anta Nante.
synopsis: Music video for the song Anta Nante. by Riria. The song was used as the ending theme of the anime Ranma ½ (2024).

title: Aries: Shinwa no Seizakyuu
synopsis: Based on the shoujo manga by Fuyuki Rurika.

title: Kokoro no Chikara
synopsis: A man in love with a noble lady tries to get close to her with the help of a cat and a dog.

title: Ero◆Lover
synopsis:
There is a dorm where male and female students live together in order to have children. Miyu enrolls at the school with this dorm, and the domineering yet attractive dorm leader Heiji becomes her roommate. Miya resists Heiji at first, but the two gradually grow closer by living together. 

(Source: ANN)

title: Puttsun Make Love
synopsis: Based on the manga by Amamiya Jun.

title: Eiyuu Banka Koushi-den
synopsis:
Born in the Chinese state of Lu in 551 B.C., Confucius is raised by his mother after his father dies when he is only three. He marries at 19 and enters the service of the local nobility. At 32, he becomes tutor to the Prince of Lu's children, eventually becoming a politician at 51. His career peaks are the roles of Lu's justice minister and eventually prime minister. The land prospers for four years, but Confucius grows disenchanted with court intrigues. For the following 12 years, he wanders the neighboring states, offering advice to their rulers.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Motokano datta Picture Drama
synopsis: Picture drama episodes which were released online on their official YouTube and Twitter channel.

title: Mawangnim-eun Juggo Sip-eo
synopsis:
Jinjoo has suddenly been transported into her favorite fantasy romance novel. This might sound like a dream come true, but Jinjoo is stuck in the body of the story's villain, Demon Queen Astreia! If she doesn't change the storyline, she will inevitably be slain by the fierce warrior, Caine. To prevent her demise, Astreia sets out on a journey to end the war between the human and demon realms. But can she win the trust of not only the parties in question but also of her suspicious companion, Caine? Or is her destiny bound to the novel's pages?

(Source: Tapas)

title: Heart Cocktail Again
synopsis:
An OVA produced to celebrate the 20th anniversary of Watase Seizou's Heart Cocktail manga.

(Source: AniDB)

title: Genji Fantasy: Neko ga Hikaru Genji ni Koi wo Shita
synopsis:
The Tale of Genji Museum in Uji City, Kyoto will be airing a short film blending history and fantasy, the story follows a modern high school girl named Hana who is transformed into a cat and transported back in time. She travels 1,000 years ago to the Heian Era as portrayed in The Tale Of Genji, arguably the most famous novel in Japanese literature. Guided by the novel's titular character Hikaru Genji, Hana experiences firsthand the emotions that the author Murasaki Shikibu depicted in her novel. The short features scenes based on The Diary of Lady Murasaki and other historical materials, such as the real-life noble Fujiwara no Michinaga swiping early drafts of The Tale Of Genji because he could not wait to read chapters as Murasaki wrote them. 

(Source: ANN)

title: Make Love
synopsis: A short film by Genshou Yasuda.

title: Saru Getchu: On Air 2nd
synopsis: Saru Getchu: On Air sequel.

title: Da Zhu Zai (2023): Nian Fan 2
synopsis: Second season of Da Zhu Zai (2023).

title: Tokimeki Tonight Recaps
synopsis: Recaps of some episodes from the TV series. Includes new humorous sketches called "Tokimeki a la Carte".

title: Chalk-iro no People
synopsis:
An OVA with five short episodes from Seizou Watase's romantic manga:
"Building Without Tide"
"Brother and Sister"
"Sometimes I'm Happy"
"I've Saved the Sidecar for You"
"The Santa Quartet"

title: Watashi no Ashinaga Ojisan Specials
synopsis: A summary of the Watashi no Ashinaga Oji-san full series aired as a TV specials.

title: Scramble Kousai feat. Hatsune Miku
synopsis: Music video by DECO*27.

title: Bollogi Iyagi
synopsis:
An award winning surreal stop motion anime from Korea using noodles, about a little Bologee (a so-called convex boy) who was born on the Concave Planet. He desperately wants to get to a another planet called Convex Star.

When he finally manages to get there he falls in love with a girl from the Convex Planet. The people living there do not approve......

title: Koshaberi Biyori
synopsis: Music video for the song Koshaberi Biyori by FantasticYouth. The song featured in this music video was used as the ending theme for the second season of Komi-san wa, Komyushou desu..

title: Mu Wang Zhi Wang: Xuan Guan Si
synopsis:
In this season, the Tomb Raiders embark on a new journey – the Hanging Coffin Temple. The Hanging Coffin Cliff is not only the third tomb in the Nine-Locked Tomb, but also the location where the attackers and defenders vie for the Tomb Breaking Token. A fierce martial arts battle with sudden changes in the situation also erupts along with internal conflicts within the Tomb Raiders faction.

(Source: Bangumi, translated)

title: Starlight Scramble Renai Kouhosei
synopsis:
In the near future, during the colony war, a girl was save by a little boy when a space station was attacked by terrorists in which the girl lost her parents.

A few years later, the girl joined her grandfather's military school. There she met a young man that looked similar to the boy who saved her... but just when she was prepared to enter the school compound, she sees a 'terrorist' lurking around which is actually a terrorist demo under the school command and so the story begins...

(Source: AniDB)

title: Rouge: Lady's Comic Video
synopsis:
Bereaved strangers lose themselves in a sordid double life of prostitution but find love with each other. A loveless marriage blossoms through bondage. A trainee gets more than she bargained for when the head nurse takes the biology lesson to the limit. And a male beautician uses unorthodox methods to put color in a makeup artist's cheeks. Four erotically charged tales animated for a female audience, based on stories originally printed in the manga magazine Rouge.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Elena Evoy Gwanchal Ilji
synopsis:
"If you're not my rival, why do I feel this way?" Blessed with both beauty and brains, it was only natural for Johann to be the top student at the Academy - that is until Elena Evoy appears. To make things worse, she seems completely unfazed by his charms, shattering his self-esteem. So why can't he stop thinking about her?

(Source: Manta)

title: Hua Jianghu: Bu Liang Ren VI
synopsis:
With the regent monopolizing the government, and the overwhelming force of the northern army, Qi Kingdom is struggling to withstand the onslaught. Watch as Li Xingyun leads the Bu Liang Ren in a desperate counterattack!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title: Huyao Xiao Hongniang 12: Jing Hua Yuan Pian
synopsis: Twelfth Season of Huyao Xiao Hongniang.

title: Hakusai Anime
synopsis:
School Life of Hakusai and her friends.

Produced by Lamaze P (ラマーズP) in collaboration with Studio Piapro and broadcasted on Nico Nico.

title: Hua Jianghu: Bu Liang Ren IV
synopsis:
The Ten Thousand Mountains are fraught with danger, and the journey to Raojiang is fraught with peril. What untold secrets do the mysterious Twelve Caves hold? Faced with powerful forces from all sides, can Li Xingyun and his companions escape unscathed? This enigmatic journey to Raojiang is about to begin...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title: Tenka Touitsu Koi no Ran: Shutsujin! Saika 4-nin Shuu
synopsis:
15th Century Japan is ravaged by constant wars, as the lords of the realm seek to rule the land. Having lost your father in battle, you are working in the restaurant he left your mother and little brother...when an evil magistrate sends your little brother away...to become a poison taster! To save his life, you disguise yourself as a boy and go to the castle in his place...but what awaits you there is so much more!

"I'll show you all...my divine rule!"

In the Sengoku era...love is the most dangerous battle of all! 

(Source: Voltage)

title: Nian Wushuang
synopsis:
The Goddess of the Machine God descended to earth to retrieve the hand of God, broke the rules and changed her fate against the will of heaven, and experienced an unparalleled love affair, achieving a double harvest in career and love. Let's see how the heroine who got the script of the hot-blooded boy comic uses the machine skills to counterattack all the way, which is exciting and full of laughter.

(Source: iQIYI, translated)

title: Shaonian Jinyiwei 2nd Season
synopsis:
The second season of The Young Imperial Guards.

Since the beginning of the Ming Dynasty, Zhu Yuanzhang, the Emperor Taizu of the Ming Dynasty, set up the commander of Jinyiwei, and then set up the south guard and the north guard to inspect hundreds of officials, with great power. The Jinyiwei have been around for a hundred years. The north guard and south guard can't work together. The foreign invaded the Central Plain. There're numerous wars in the Jianghu and bandits are rampant. There're also the famous robbers. A young Jinyiwei, Yuan Xiaotang, as the son of Yuan Xiaozhi, the commander of the north guard, saw the sudden change in the imperial city and wanted to prove that he had made great achievements.

(Source: CAD)

title: Otoko to Onna to Inu
synopsis: Short animated film by Kuri Youji.

title: Shenyi Jiu Xiaojie 2nd Season
synopsis: Second season of Shenyi Jiu Xiaojie.

title: Monogatari no Aru Satou
synopsis: A short animation promoting the Komaya company. A lonely sugar elephant searches for companionship.

title: So-na-gi
synopsis: A little girl always plays on the stepping stones in the brook. A shy little boy hovers around her unable to ask her that he wishes to be alone. Suddenly, it rains and they seek shelter together, which brings them closer.

title: Aitakute
synopsis: Music video for the song Aitakute by Ado.

title: Shounen Sunday CM: Hayate no Gotoku!
synopsis: Hayate no Gotoku! television commercial for the Shounen Sunday magazine.

title: Zhihao Beipan Diqiule
synopsis:
Lu Fan, a white-collar urban woman who has always considered herself a more ordinary woman than anyone else, is suddenly abducted by an alien one day. The alien, who claim to be from Saturn, tells the absurd reason for their invasion of Earth, and that the key to the invasion plan is to make Lu Fan fall in love with him and then betray the Earth.

In the funny daily life with the Saturnian, aliens from various planets start to appear around Lu Fan one after another! These aliens have their own objectives, but because of their intertwined destinies, they all end up in Beijing. Lu Fan begins to realize that she is not as ordinary as she thought, and she slowly develops a crush on the Saturnian. How will she choose?

(Source: iQIYI)

title: Samurai
synopsis: A short film by Kuri Youji.

title: Trapp Ikka Monogatari Specials
synopsis: A summary of the Trapp Ikka Monogatari full series aired as a TV specials.

title: Pi Zhe Lang Pi de Yang
synopsis:
Online novelist Lai Xiaoguang accidentally enters a virtual world called "The Hand of God." In this fantastical world, she becomes a werewolf named Da Niu and gets caught up in a case involving the theft of national treasures. To investigate the truth, she is forced to embark on a journey with the sheep king Wangcai.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title: Rainbow Signal: Hi-Fi Set
synopsis:
These are six loosely-related anime/live-action music videos from the band Hi-Fi Set. For the most part, they form a story about the love life of two cute dragons who live in a high-tech future city. This disc was released in 1985, right in the middle of Hi-Fi Set's career (1974-1994), and features songs from that era (from their 1984 and 1985 albums Pasadena Park and Indigo).

(Source: Piyo-Piyo Productions)

title: Suki da
synopsis: Music video of the song Suki da by YOASOBI.

title: Joukyuusei
synopsis: A music video for the song "Joukyuusei" by Hiroko Moriguchi. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Hua Jianghu: Huan Shi Men Sheng 2nd Season
synopsis: Second season of Hua Jianghu: Huan Shi Men Sheng.

title: Boku no Oldies wa All Color
synopsis: A minimalist adaptation of Seizo Watase's manga of the same name. It contains 5 stories of slow paced vignettes of romance whose only dialogue lies within the "oldies" being played as background music.

title: Xian Jian Qi Xia Zhuan: Huan Li Jing
Ijhyeojin Hwangnyeoneun Pyeonghwalobge Salgo Sip-eo
synopsis:
I'm the daughter of a Duke?!
While locked up in a prison cell, Eluana Vita awakens her alchemy powers and later finds out she's the daughter of a Duke! However, she's in for a rude awakening when she realizes the royal life isn't what she thought it'd be. Join Eluana on her journey to find the peaceful life she's always wanted.

(Source: Manta)

title: Kunshu-sama ni Muneyake
synopsis:
Aria's world is thrown into chaos when Crown Prince Julius, the brilliant but insufferable royal she's sworn to protect as Captain of his Guard, announces her as his future bride. Stunned, Aria confronts him, and Julius offers a way out: if she can defeat him in any competition before the wedding in six months, he'll cancel the engagement. But with Julius' unmatched skills, winning won't be easy. Can Aria outsmart the talented prince and reclaim her life?

(Source: WEBTOONS)

title: Asa ga Kuru mae ni: Sasurai Version
synopsis: Music video for Asa ga Kuru mae ni: Sasurai Version single by Japanese rock band Tsuru.

title: Oshi ga Buka ni Narimashita
synopsis:
Sayaka Tsuneda, age 29, works at an advertising agency when one day a suit-wearing angel descends before her very own eyes?! The idol that gave her life worth meaning is now her co-worker and she's in charge of his training... Is this a dream?! Sayaka struggles to handle her own feelings as the two of them grow closer and closer. How will this awkward fan girl's love story end?!

(Source: MangaPlaza)

title: [Watashi no Ofuru de Waruin dakedo] to Okaasama (Heroine) ni Torimaki wo Oshitsukerare, Totsuida Henkyou demo Yome Atsukai Saremasen ga, Okage de Jiyuu ni Ikiraremasu!
synopsis:
After being handed one of her mother's attendants as a fiancé and effectively kicked out of the royal palace, a young noblewoman begins an uneasy new life in her husband's household. The atmosphere is anything but welcoming, though her expressionless husband seems surprisingly kind. With her beloved dolls as companions, she settles into her new home, only to find herself with far too much free time. This is the start of a lighthearted marriage story about unexpected bonds, quiet days, and the dolls who make them a little less lonely.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Kagari Hibana
synopsis:
A boy genius, Hurt, and a flower girl, Hibana. Hibana, a flower girl, is a dropout. The two childhood friends have lived completely different lives since they were small children. Hurt speaks warmly to Hibana to encourage her to run away from the coming-of-age ceremony. However, his voice did not reach her heart. Then, an incident occurred that changed their destiny drastically... A great adventure set in the World Tree. A few years before the day of their journey In the deep forest, what is it that befalls the inexperienced boy and girl...!

(Source: YouTube)

title: Bokutachi no Kidzuki-hen
synopsis: A special short to promote the web app of JRA-VAN TRY for horse races.

title: Chuuhai Lemon: Love 30s - Ame ni Nurete mo
synopsis:
Bug-eyed Katsumi (known as Chuhai to his friends) is a muscle-bound detective determined to use his strength and pig-headed stupidity to rescue his teenage girlfriend from a succession of embarrassing situations. 

Based on a manga by Sho Fumimura and heavily seeded with background music from the 1960s U.S. hit parade.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Suiyoubi no Yakusoku
synopsis: Music video animated by Mogelatte for the song Suiyoubi no Yakusoku by HoneyWorks featuring Gero.

title: Honoo no Alpenrose: Ai no Symphony Ongaku-hen
synopsis: A music-video style recap OVA. This release covers episode 12-20 and is with classical music entirely except for one song right before the credits. The beginning also has a unique frosted boarder frame around the video that changes designs which was not present in the the first music recap nor in the original anime.

title: Tsuyoshi Shikkari Shinasai: Tsuyoshi no Time Machine de Shikkari Shinasai
synopsis:
Tsuyoshi and his perverted friend Tsukasa stumble upon a time machine while running away from Tsukasa's little sister. Along with the time machine's inventor they accidentally travel 12 years to the past and meet their younger selves along with Tsuyoshi's sister who back then wasn't a violent tomboy like nowadays.

(Source: MaouNemesis)

title: Shinja Zero no Megami-sama to Hajimeru Isekai Kouryaku
synopsis:
High school student and video game-lover Makoto Takatsuki dies in an accident and awakens in another world beside his classmates. However, he gains no cheat-like abilities, so he decides to become a "Magic Apprentice."

Then Noa, a minor goddess, appears before him. After she pleads and begs him, he decides to become her first believer. The weakest boy in the class becomes the strongest alongside the minor goddess in this another world fantasy!

(Source: Overlap, translated)

title: Nushen You Dian Ling
synopsis:
Yao Ling and Hu Xiaozhen, who parted ways due to a misunderstanding in childhood, reunited in the academy after they grew up. The infatuated female protagonist hopes to continue writing a sweet journey with the male protagonist, but due to the appearance of the mysterious administrator, Ma Shen, "accidents" occur frequently. Under the lure of Ma Shen's plan, the two became acting administrators and they help spirits to realize their long-cherished dreams, in order to continue their progress in love. Through the experience of missions again and again, the relationship between Hu and Yao becomes deeper and deeper, and they are moving towards the road of righteousness. But the true purpose of Ma Shen gradually implicates the operating laws behind the world, and more mysteries, and dangers lie between the hero and heroine. 

(Source: Bilibili, Google translated & edited)

title: Baito-saki wa "Aku no Soshiki"!?
synopsis:
Arihisa Aokura needs money. He needs money in order to support his family of orphans and earn a living at the same time. Looking online for potential employees, he finds a posting for a part time job in an "evil organization." Seeing that the pay and benefits were fairly substantial, he took the chance and took the interview. He was somehow hired and now has to work as a henchman inside the evil organization "Antares." Will he be able to survive the onslaught of missions against heroes while providing for his orphan brothers and sisters?

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Koishita Hito wa, Imouto no Kawari ni Shindekure to Itta. Imouto to Kekkon shita Kataomoi Aite ga Naze Imasara Watashi no Moto ni? To Omottara
synopsis:
Lady Wisteria's greatest wish is to be worthy of the man she loves, Lord Bright. But when Wisteria's little sister, Rosalie, is selected to enter the Predawn Realm as its guardian, never to return, Bright begs Wisteria to take Rosalie's place! After all, Wisteria is skilled with magic, and resistant to the sinister miasma that threatens the mortal world. Heartbroken, Wisteria enters the Predawn Realm, accompanied by the sacred sword, Sartis. More than twenty years later, a stranger with a familiar face appears, demanding the sword and challenging Wisteria. Who is he, and why does he resemble Lord Bright...?

(Source: Tokyopop)

title: Niji ni Mukatte
synopsis:
Film by Okamoto Tadanari, winner of the Ōfuji Noburō Award in 1977 for the 32nd Mainichi Film Awards in recognition of animation excellence.

The story of two villages on either side of a river who come together to build a bridge to connect their villages and thereby permit a young couple in love to be joined in marriage.

title: Kagami
synopsis: One of the first films of Okamoto Tadanari, a silent puppet animated film.

title: Butagini Jugeojura
synopsis:
I just want to tell him how I feel!
Mina has been planning on telling Yeomyung she likes him. But every time she goes to confess, something foils her plans. It turns out Yeomyung and Youngwoong, her best friend, were actually plotting to kill her. But why?!

(Source: Manta)

title: Ni De Rensheng Shi Wo Lai Chi Le
synopsis:
In the name of "sister", Jiang Lan adopted Gu Chi, who no one wanted to take care of, and became a ray of light in Gu Chi's dark life. Gu Chi also gradually fell in love with this beautiful "sister". Will the age gap hinder the development of their relationship? How will the domineering "sister" respond to the "brother's" confession? 

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title: White Tree
synopsis: A music video of a song by the same name, performed by the band SID.

title: Nani Warotonnen
synopsis: Music video for the song Nani Warotonnen by Yoshino. The song was used as the ending theme of the anime Raise wa Tanin ga Ii.

title: Hope
synopsis: Music video for the song Hope by Kano.

title: Yamaguchi Sanchi no Tsutomu-kun
synopsis: A music video for the song by Keiji Kawahashi that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta Program.

title: Maarui Kanojo to Zannen na Kareshi 2nd Season
synopsis: Second season of Maarui Kanojo to Zannen na Kareshi.

title: Kurumiwari Ningyou (2014)
synopsis: A 2014 adaptation of the original Nutcracker story by E.T.A. Hoffmann.

title: Jiyuantai Qihao
synopsis:
Ziming, a University undergraduate, is entangled between his amorous feelings for a self-exiled mother Mrs Yu from Taiwan and her beautiful daughter Meiling, in the era coincides with Hong Kong's turbulent times of 1967.

(Source: IMDB)

title: Oni no Hanayome wa Taberaretai
synopsis:
When she was young, Mashiro's life was saved by an oni. Turning 17, the ripe age to be eaten, she goes to marry him. However, he ends up doting on her excessively and has no intention to eat her?! The story of two unconsciously lovey-dovey newlyweds.

(Source: Hakusensha, translated)

title: Junzi Wu Ji
synopsis:
The down-and-out fairy Yao Ji who traveled through time and space! The young Liu Ling who needed to see himself found the magic stone. The two reached a cooperation and found the concubines with special skills to teach them. Liu Ling successfully started his journey to the East Palace. As they spent time together day and night, he suddenly found that he had different feelings for Yao Ji...

(Source: Bilibili, Google translated)

title: Ran Xia
synopsis:
Having defeated the invincible legend, the new junior sister apprentice must not be simple. Shen Dong, once the most powerful apprentice of the sect, simply wants to live a stable life, but Xia Ri breaks his peaceful life. Xia Ri makes trouble everywhere and seems to be perverse and unruly, but she's actually a kind and warm person. Shen Dong is gradually influenced and moved by her. The conflicts between the four major sects are constantly escalating. It's time to settle both old and new grudges.

(Source: Bilibili)

title: Huyao Xiao Hongniang 13: Huang Feng Ling Pian
synopsis: Thirteenth season of Huyao Xiao Hongniang.

synopsis: The special is confined to the wedding of Prince Akishino with his chosen Kiko Kawashima.

title: Suteki na Okurimono
synopsis: Christmas-themed indie animation from 2019. It was made by Junya Iwake.

title: Tenuto
synopsis: Music video directed by Kousuke Sugimoto for the song Tenuto by Handsome Kenya on the mini album "Black Frame." The album had two releases, one which included a bonus DVD featuring this music video and a short documentary about Handsome Kenya. The music video was posted on YouTube along with a preview of the documentary in a single video. This entry only accounts for the runtime of the music video.

title: Shounen Sunday CM: Tenshi na Konamaiki
synopsis: Tenshi na Konamaiki television commercial for the Shounen Sunday magazine.

title: Kirari Kagayaku
synopsis:
Tekken is the tourism ambassador for Omachi in the Nagano Prefecture. It is his home town. The short is a story based on men's and women's romance set within the city and features the Shinano-Omachi Station, the Omachi hot springs village, the Omachi Mountain Museum, etc.

Tekken stated to Oricon News that it took him 3 months to write the story. The film contains 2381 hand drawn pages.

title: 9: Ruler's Crown - Branch X
synopsis:
A special program, delivered from Sophitia's perspective, retracing the journey so far—featuring newly recorded music and fresh announcements—crafted to be enjoyed both by first-time viewers and longtime fans alike.

(Source: Official site)

title: Kagee Grimm Douwa
synopsis: The 3rd arc of the Chiyotarou Kodomo Gekijou program that aired on TBS. Every episode is a different Brothers Grimm fairy tale told with shadow puppet animation.

title: Aishiteru (2010)
synopsis: Music video by Kouki Tange and YELLOW BRAIN for the song Aishiteru by Monkey Majik in their three-song album under the same name. It features a blend of live-action and animation.

title: 47 Todoufuken Specials
synopsis: A two-part TV special focusing on the romance between the dogs.

title: Sollo Talchul Gwi
synopsis:
After serving his military duty, Jung-hoon, who has never had a girlfriend, returns to college. He has a secret crush on Eun-ji, a member of the school’s paranormal activity research club called Mysteria, in which he also belongs. One day, Jung-hoon meets Ji-sun, a virgin ghost, by chance, and Ji-sun asks him for help with her Scare tests, the exams that she needs to pass in order to be reborn. In return, Jung-hoon makes an arrangement with Ji-sun to help him score points with Eun-ji. While trying to help each other’s problems, the two run into disagreements, but their feelings for each other grow deeper as time passes.

(Source: KMDb)

title: Kenka no Ato wa
synopsis: Music video for the song Kenka no Ato wa by Shimon Masato that was featured on Fuji TV's Hirake! Ponkikki program.

title: Yuki no Furu Machi

title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei 3rd Season Special
synopsis:
The Irregular at Magic High School Ancient Capital Civil War Arc 1 bonus footage includes a hot spring scene with Miyuki and Minami that was not shown on TV. This special footage can only be seen in the Blu-ray & DVD Volume 5.

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

title: Bijutsu Kyouiku
synopsis: An early graduation silent short film by Megumi Ishitani, depicting the conflict between two artists and their mentees.

title: Geunyeoneun Yeppeotda
synopsis:
Three thirty-something friends meet each other for the first time in ten years. But when one of them goes on a blind date with a gorgeous girl, things become quite complicated. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: Mu Wang Zhi Wang: You Du Zhan
synopsis:
The 12th year of the Tai Calendar Luo Wuzi was ordered to build the Tomb of King Qin. Then he was given the title King of the Tomb. After building it, he became the King of the Tomb City and ruled over the Tomb of the World.

Since then The tomb sect in Jianghu is in its heyday. But then, The Tomb sect is split. King of the Tombs heir, Mu Rong Shi may be a Tomb Guards Sect. The Luo family ran away, and build the Luo Family Ancestral Hall as a separate faction and is understood because of the Tomb Attackers Sect.

When the Two sects meet If a subsequent generation of the Tomb Attacker Sect succeeded in getting Tomb Destruction Orders at the Nine-Locked Chain Tomb they’ll get the King’s Tomb Throne. For thousands of years both the good Sect, the Tomb Attacker Sect, and therefore, the Tomb Guards Sect very difficult to separate. To the present day, king Palace deliberately put treasure within the tomb. Tomb Guards Sect, Mu Rong Xian, to point out his loyalty he smuggled the tomb guard against the outside.

(Source: Kurina Official)

title: Kagee Mukashibanashi
synopsis: The 1st arc of the Chiyotarou Kodomo Gekijou program that aired on TBS. Every episode is a different Japanese fairy tale told with shadow puppet animation.

title: Tokai no Butchy
synopsis: Anime made by Tezuka Productions.

title: Kachou Fuugetsu (Music)
synopsis: Music video for the song Kachou Fuugetsu by Aimer that was included as one of two original songs on her compilation album "BEST SELECTION 'blanc'". The video was directed by Atsushi Makino.

title: Shippo no Kimochi
synopsis: Two anthropomorphic cats fall in love. The girl especially loves his fluffy soft tail.

title: Naeil-eun Pyeongbeomhae Jilgeoya
synopsis:
A special included on Indie Anibox: Selma Danbaekjil Coffee's DVD release. It was meant to be the "making-of" extra of Watashi no Coffee Samurai but is an early pilot with a different story (the idea of a mechanized girl and transforming guy vs. a mechanized transforming guy and normal girl). Director Jang Hyeong-yoon stewed on this early creation for over half a decade before the original idea was re-worked again into a feature film Ulibyeol Ilhowa Eollugso.

In the special, the girl is mechanized and fights kaijuu with her giant flying bird. The guy is a musician who confesses his feelings. When the girl runs away after his kiss (worried that her line of work may bring him danger if she reciprocated), he turns into a milk cow out of shock. They reconcile in the end.

title: Xingchen Bian 7th Season
synopsis:
The descent of Mount Tianzun and the appearance of the Spiritual Treasure Cauldron ignited a frenzied struggle among the God-Kings for the "Azure Heaven Seal," the "Earth Seal," and the "Seal of Ten Thousand People." Qin Yu, a new father, is drawn into a conflict with powerful enemies like the Blood Sea Queen to save his brother Hou Fei. When Jiang Lan obtains the Earth Seal and becomes the target of everyone's anger, Qin Yu displays astonishing strength, intimidating the assembled heroes. However, the appearance of the Seal of Ten Thousand People brought even more brutal bloodshed. The Blood Sea Queen, disregarding the bloodshed of the God-Kings to seize the Seal of Ten Thousand People, Qin Yu, in a rage, slays powerful enemies to reclaim it. To end this conflict, he devises a scheme, luring those who coveted the seal into his mysterious domain, where he settles old scores. Ultimately, the three seals merge, and a new Heavenly Venerable is born. However, old grudges remain unresolved, and a Heavenly Venerable-level expert comes seeking revenge, triggering unexpected consequences. Qin Yu's fate thus embarks on an unknown realm beyond the imagination of all the God-Kings.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title: San Jian Hao Zhi Ban Mian Ren
synopsis:
This animation epic tells the story of the guardians of the "Heavenly Martial Treasure" of Genghis Khan, who protected it during the "Tumu Crisis" in the Ming Dynasty. After the massacre of the guardians in one night, the young lord Wuyunzong, the sole survivor of the guardians, seeks revenge and searches for the treasure. Along the way, he encounters a series of thrilling adventures involving pursuit and growth, love and friendship, conspiracy and betrayal.

(Source: TMDB)

title: Damen's Walker
synopsis: Damen is a coined word combining "Dame (failed)" and "Men". It's a collection of short stories about women's experiences with "Damen (failed men like swindler, liar etc.)".

title: Mannequin
synopsis: Music video for the song ' Mannequin by DECO*27 feat. Hatsune Miku.

title: Honoo no Alpenrose: Sweet Memory Ongaku-hen
synopsis: A music-video style recap OVA. This release covers episode 1-11. Some music used is full song versions with accompanied singing, other sections of the recap are entirely classical Austrian music.

title: Kagee Aesop Monogatari
synopsis: The 2nd arc of the Chiyotarou Kodomo Gekijou program that aired on TBS. Every episode is a different Aesop fable told with shadow puppet animation.

title: Kimagure Orange☆Road: Summarized Edition
synopsis: Special recap with the best scenes of Kimagure Orange☆Road.

title: Otoko wa Tsurai yo: Torajirou Wasurenagusa
synopsis:
Anime adaptation of the "Otoko wa Tsurai yo (It's tough being a man)" film series by Youji Yamada.

Kuruma Torajirou (or Tora-san), a traveling salesman whose sole possessions include only the contents of a small suitcase, the clothes on his back and some pocket money, wanders from town to town peddling his wares.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: Kimi no Suki ni Deaou.
synopsis: Commercials directed by Toshitaka Shinoda for the d-anime store. They feature the song "Matasaburo" by Yorushika.

title: Dai Ichiya
synopsis: A music video for the song Dai Ichiya by Yorushika.

title: Wedding Park
synopsis:
Wedding information site Wedding Park, which gives word-of-mouth recommendations for venues, has released an animated advertisement online. The ad shows the Wedding Park mascot character Wepa appearing in front of a couple in the middle of their proposal. The heart-shaped mascot then takes the couple into a smartphone that shows them information about wedding venues. More animated commercials are expected to be released.

(Source: ANN)

title: Two on the Road: Itsumo Futari de
synopsis:
Two anthology releases of 13 short stories, based on originals by Seizo Watase. As with other adaptations of Watase's work, they are set to music-stories here include: Ashes of Love, White Fish/Blue Fish, Dance on the Sands, Glider, Handbag Mirror, Blue Snow, Living in the World, etc.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Suntory Can Beer CMs
synopsis: Commercials for Suntory Beer featuring characters that would later be used in the film Penguin's Memory: Shiawase Monogatari.

title: Kikaijikake no Marie Mini Anime Episode 0
Hua Jianghu: Bu Liang Ren Qi - Jiu Youxuan Tian
synopsis:
The situation in Mobei appears calm on the surface, but in reality, undercurrents are surging. Queen Shuliduo is planning a grand assembly, while Bu Liang Shuai has led a group of Bu Liang Ren to Mobei to investigate its movements. During this time, the Four Great Corpse Ancestors, led by the surrendered minister, have also arrived in Mobei and opened an antique soup shop. Meanwhile, a mysterious murderer has thrown the people into panic. Various forces harbor their own intentions...

(Source: WeTV)

title: 5-toubun no Hanayome 5-shuunen Kinen PV
synopsis: A promotional video for the fifth anniversary of the 5-toubun no Hanayome anime.

title: Nagseo feat. Yerin Baek
synopsis: Music video directed by mareykrap for the single Nagseo feat. Yerin Baek by South Korean rapper Punchnello.

title: Cheng Ye Xiao He
synopsis:
Xiao He leads a successful double life as a medical science student with top grades by day and a professional e-sports gamer by night. However, his life isn't all sunshine and rainbows: he keeps bumping into this bothersome girl in-game called Escape Artist Tao, a notorious PKer who's declared him to be her archenemy. These two top-ranked players can't seem to get away from each other despite their mutual disdain. However, their feelings start to become something more...

(Source: Comikey Media)

title: Byeoli Bichnaneun Bame
synopsis:
The Starry Night tells about the love that becomes clearer as time goes by, through the process of organizing his own life, loving an old lover.

(Source: vcrworks.kr)

title: 667-tsuu no Love Letter
synopsis:
667 Love Letters was produced to commemorate the resumption of sales of Lipton paper pack series milk tea, which was discontinued in March 2022. 

The ad itself is titled 667 Love Letters, in reference to the number of letters the company received from Lipton Royal Milk Tea enjoyers between April to September 2022.

(Source: ANN)

title: Oyone to Mattsan: Ai no Uta
synopsis: A story set in the countryside of Japan. Two teens meet and slowly fall in love. Their relationship has difficulties developing as her father doesn't approve of the boy's request for her hand in marriage. Part of the OVA features a karaoke-style songs with lyrics present on-screen.

title: Aisu
synopsis: Animated music video for the song Aisu by CreepHyp.

title: Jidou Bungaku Library
synopsis: A series of children's OVAs covering various stories from old folk tales, books, and historical events. Each OVA has a various amount of stories featured.

title: Uchuu Sanpo
synopsis: Music video for the song Uchuu Sanpo by DECO*27 feat. Hatsune Miku.

title: Soratobu Penguin
synopsis: Two penguins in love soar with emotions.

title: Period of the Mouseman
synopsis:
In Period of the Mouseman, a young man grapples with his transformation into a cyborg modeled after a mouse

(Source: HDIVE)

title: No More Princes
synopsis:
This is the legendary tale of valiant princes, devoting their lives to rescue the princess from the evil drake that has been terrorizing the nation...

"Here I am, my damsel in distress, I will smite the dragon and return you back to the golden castle!" When the brave prince roars his promise, our beautiful princess Mikaella asks the question to drake. "Xeno, I don't want to be saved by him... Please take care of him." The mighty "evil" dragon responds, "Anything for my sweet Mikaella."

(Source: Pocket Comics)

title: Kongjwi & Patjwi
synopsis:
Kongjui, who had been living alone with her father, welcomes a stepmother and a stepsister called Patchui into her life. When her father is out, the stepmother and Patchui make her do all the housework and the stepmother believes all of Patchui's lies and beats Kongjui mercilessly. When talks of marriage between Kongjui and the son of a respectable family come out one day, the stepmother does everything in her power to get Patchui married to the young man. Unaware of her stepmother's plans, Kongjui runs into the young man in the woods and the two fall in love.

Source: (themoviedb.org)

title: Yogishayo Isoge
synopsis: Music video for the song Yogishayo Isoge by Tetsuya Gen that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Hiroshi Nishimura.

title: Nogiku no Haka
synopsis:
An educational film about love and respect. 

Tamiko (17) and Masao (15) are cousins. They grew up together as siblings but in adulthood they wanted to wed each other. However Tamiko's sister-in-law was jealous and tried to tear them apart by forcing Tamiko to marry another man.

title: My Boy

Set in Ikevo Academy, we follow the comedic love story of a young man aspiring to become a voice actor. In the spirit of promoting voice acting education, members of the general public auditioned to voice the characters in the show.

synopsis: "Akaito" is the sequel to Sarishinohara and Yonjuunana, being the third song in the series.

title: Zaixia "Yingtai"

A girl with superhuman strength ventures into the city, only to discover she's the third-generation successor of a mystical sect. She enrolls in an academy to study and rectify unhealthy practices. When assassins from an enemy nation storm the palace, the girl leads her team to easily subdue them!

title: Wakusei
synopsis: Animated music video for the song Wakusei by Omoinotake.

title: Koi wa Elevator
synopsis: Two elevators struggle to connect as they're swayed by people around them.

title: Suiyoubi no Yakusoku: Another Story

synopsis: Assorted children's fables. Ranging from the classic Japanese tale of Momotarou to the classic European tale of Gulliver's Travels.

title: Neulin Jangma
synopsis:
Trying new things is never easy.
Ohran Lim is an ex-boxer who never managed to go pro. Now, she spends her days working at the local convenience store, wondering where it all went wrong. But after she meets young couple Woon and Baram, she slowly begins to change her outlook on life. "I need to find what makes me happy."

(Source: Manta)

title: Sakura Kimi Watashi
synopsis: Music video for the song Sakura Kimi Watashi by tuki.

synopsis: Music video for the song Heart by group_inou.

synopsis: Music video for the song Yoru to Itoshii by Mizuki Wai.

title: Chocotto no Answer
synopsis: Music video for the song Chocotto no Answer by Mafumafu.

title: Summer is Over feat. Mai Anna
synopsis:
A Man (Adam) is walking and meets a Woman (Eve). They are drawn to each other, and as they continue their journey together, they are metamorphosed into different forms. While in love with each other, they both eat the forbidden fruit and end up losing their physical bodies. What will happen to them at the end of their lives, when they lose their bodies but still love each other with all their hearts?

(Source: YouTube)

title: Andersen
synopsis: Music video for the song Andersen by harha.

title: Arigatou: Kokoro no Bara
synopsis: Music video for the song Arigatou: Kokoro no Bara by Mike Maki that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Shinbigan
synopsis: Music video for the song Shinbigan by Wanuka.

title: Chuuchuu
synopsis:
A man was born. He met a woman whom he fell in love with and kissed. They separated, but two people change shape and are reborn over time. A kiss is eternal. A journey of new life born from a kiss.

(Source: YouTube)

title: Destiny
synopsis:
Graduate Work 2021 by Minori Matsuoka, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

Yui has become estranged from her boyfriend, who doesn't even wish her happy birthday. Her friend Aya introduces a fortune teller said to be the real deal. What does destiny hold for them? This is a romantic comedy made during self-quarantine.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

title: Neoui Moseub
synopsis: Music video for the song Neoui Moseub by Jung Dong-ha.

title: Hudie Meng: Liang Shan Bo yu Zhu Ying Tai
synopsis:
The Butterfly Lovers is an animated re-telling of the classical Chinese story of two lovers, Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai.

(Source: IMDB)

title: Bamgwa Byeol-ui Nolae
synopsis: Animated music video for the song Bamgwa Byeol-ui Nolae by Lee Jin-ah and ONEW.

title: Simple
synopsis: Music video for the song Simple by Maiko Fujita.

title: No Matter What
synopsis: Music video for the song No Matter What by Beenzino and BoA.

title: Ai no Sungekijou
synopsis: A video created for Hideki Inaba's friend's wedding ceremony.

title: Ten made Todoke
synopsis:
On NHK's "Uta Techne", we created a sequel to the family deck in conjunction with the beloved Masashi Sada's Ten made Todoke.

(Source: NHK)

title: Gwang-jang
synopsis:
Tall, blonde and blue-eyed, it is impossible not to notice Isak Borg, First Secretary to the Swedish Embassy in Pyongyang. As a diplomat, he is under constant surveillance and strongly discouraged from interacting with the locals. Despite this, he secretly dates Bok-joo, a local traffic officer, but when one last effort to extend his stay is rejected, Isak begs her to come back to Stockholm with him. Bok-joo turns this idea down and abruptly disappears. Oblivious to the danger he is putting the woman he loves in, Isak asks Myeong-jun, his assigned interpreter, for help. When Myeong-jun refuses, a desperate Isak becomes increasingly suspicious of everyone.

(Source: Tribeca Film)

title: Boyfriend (Music)
synopsis: Music video for the song Boyfriend by Mao Abe.

title: Nostalgia
synopsis: Music video for the song Nostalgia by Kim Se-hwang and Kim Jung-mo.

Diao Man Gonzhu Gan Fu Ma

title: Cassis to Arles no Monogatari
synopsis:
Cassis is the only daughter of a bakery in the small town of Fran. Her daily routine is to deliver freshly baked bread to the people of the town every morning. One day, a blonde young man named Arles comes to Cassis's shop. She is gradually drawn to him for his refreshing and gentle gaze. However, there is a reason why the young man has come to this town.

(Source: Official site, translated)

title: Ninja Meshi no Uta
synopsis:
Once a ninja was on a mission, he would sometimes go without food or drink, so he needed emergency food called "ninja food." We are modern ninjas too, and we are always under a lot of stress. "Ninja Meshi," a modern version of ninja food, is a gummy candy with a hard texture that locks in the flavor of the ingredients. Chew it to your heart's content and satisfy your hunger!

title: Xian Jian Qi Xia Zhuan Si
synopsis:
For the sake of their cultivation endeavors, the Qionghua Sect sent its elders to forge two swords, Wangshu and Xihe, and sought two disciples to wield them in dual cultivation, attempting to bind the demon realm and seize its immense spiritual power. This ultimately triggered a great war between humans and demons, resulting in heavy casualties on both sides. During this time, Su Yu, the host of Wangshu, disagreed with the Qionghua Sect's cultivation philosophy and left the sect with Yun Tianqing. The demon realm seized the opportunity to escape, and the Qionghua Sect's leader perished in the war. 

The two married on Qingluan Peak and had a son, Yun Tianhe. They both died young due to the icy cold that invaded their bodies. Young Yun Tianhe grew up alone on Qingluan Mountain. He was unaware of his parents' past, and the unexpected arrival of Han Lingsha set the wheels of fate turning once more.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title: Zui Hou Jue Ding Ai Shang Ni
synopsis:
Two strangers, both proposed marriage to their respective girl/boyfriend, were rejected on the same day. They decided that the best way to deal with the rejection was to get drunk, real drunk. During the 24 hours of their crazy drunkenness, these two stranger became fast friends and got married... to each other. When they finally sobered up, they embarked on a mission to undo every crazy thing they did while they were drunk and prayed that their girl/boyfriend don't find out.

(Source: MyDramaList)
